scripts.clean: concurrently "rimraf node_modules" "cd client && rimraf node_modules build" "cd server && rimraf node_modules build"
scripts.install: (cd client && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.heroku-postbuild: (cd client && npm run build) && (cd server && npm run build)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 npm start" "cd server && PORT=3001 npm run dev"
